content: S-MD HWH #4, #5 Self-drilling metal screws Self-drilling screw (zinc-plated carbon steel) with superior corrosion resistance without washer for thick metal-to-metal fastenings (up to 0.5 in) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Corrosion resistance tested to 1000 hours of salt-spray testing as per ASTM B117 Fast and robust tip Applications Fastening sheet metal and profiles to steel substructures and framing, with or without intermediate insulation layers Thin to medium-thick metal-to-metal connections (up to 0.5 in) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Hexagon head Screw drive/recess type: 5/16 Hexagon Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Hexagon head | Screw drive/recess type | 5/16 Hexagon | Collated | No | Product Class | Premium | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 7 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 2313928 - Self-drill screw S-MD12-24x7/8 HWH4(CRC) - Package Size 4500 pc
